name: Content
desc: A description of a piece of playback content, such as a song, podcast, or advertisement.

items.name: control
items.desc: The set of controls the user may access while the client is playing this content. Define controls in the QueueControlMapping object.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: A stable identifier for this content. Content identifiers must be unique within a Queue.

items.name: isLive
items.desc: true for a live stream, false for prerecorded content.

items.name: playIndex
items.desc: This content’s position within the playback queue.

items.name: url
items.desc: A URL to request the audio or video data.
